application.model

Class DeadlineList

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.model.DeadlineList

  • public class DeadlineList
extends java.lang.Object
    The DeadlineList class represents a container for Deadlines. It has a name and an ArrayList containing Deadline objects.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ieuan Vinluan

      • sortDeadlineList

        public static void sortDeadlineList(java.util.ArrayList<Deadline> deadlines,
                                    int low,
                                    int high,
                                    Deadline pivot)
        Sorts the contained Deadlines by date and time using Quick Sort
        Parameters:
        deadlines - the ArrayList of Deadlines to be sorted
        low - the starting index
        high - the ending index
        pivot - the element that will be used as basis for the division of the elements in sorting
